name: Staircase (BerailGames)
description:
Staircase is an horror game based on the SCP 087.

This project was a experiment to create a game in a month with time I had available to me. A sof today deadline project is finished in 75%. There is lack of "ghost" and couple of additional storytelling mediums.

Main issue I had time wise was due to procedural generation of floors I could not use the navmesh provided by unity and writing it from the scratch overscoped my timeline.

Project was created to test some ideas, ways of implementation and how long some things will take me for my next project.
